p: he Thomas Heuphy believes from the above testimony that the said John Harding was acessory to the murder of Peter Gallagher and it being found on the trail that said John Harding was quietly is having withheld in formation from the proper authority that would have prevented the commission of this murder aforesaid which was committed on the 1st day of Dec 1878 at the house of said John Harding and whereas the said John Harding has failed to give bail in the sum of five hundred dollars for his appearance at the next term of the district court as required of me I herefore in the name of the United States you are commanded with the necessary force and assistance to recieve the said John Har4ding into your custody in the jail and him there safely until he is discharged by due course of law. Given under my hand this 23rd day of December A. D. 1878 Seniah Stevens Justice of the Peace
